page.title: 08Farming Manor Farm
page.content: {Manor Farm,Sandford} {Road,Gt.Baddow,Essex.CM2 7RT} Richard Carter farms 237 acres of which 40 acres are used for "Pick Your Own" crops.The 237 acres are split as: 50 acres - potatoes, 68 - winter wheat, 30 - onions, 18 - strawberries, 5 - raspberries, 2 - gooseberries, 2 - black currants, 1 - black berries, 1 - loganberries, 1 - asparagus, 5 - grassland. The largest field is 44 acres and contained winter wheat. 40 acres out of the full 237 acres is used for P.Y.O. such as strawberries, and onions.The farmer put some trees next to some of the fruit bushes because it stops the wind breaking the bushes.The Farm Shop sells fresh produce.
